text.__SUMMARY__: Clithon corona is a species of brackish water and freshwater snail with an operculum, a nerite. It is an aquatic gastropod mollusk in the family Neritidae, the nerites.
text.Ecology: The freshwater crab Clibanarius fonticola uses shells of Clithon corona only.
text.Human use: It is a part of ornamental pet trade for freshwater aquaria.
